title: It's insulting to read AI-generated blog posts
author: speckx
aiHeadline: AI-generated blog posts are so bad, reading them feels like a personal insult to your intelligence.

title: 10M people watched a YouTuber shim a lock; the lock company sued him â€“ bad idea

title: Recall for Linux
author: anticensor
aiHeadline: Linux finally gets a recall, because even open-source software can't escape the occasional 'oops, we messed up.'

title: PSF has withdrawn $1.5M proposal to US Government grant program
author: lumpa
aiHeadline: Python Foundation says 'no thanks' to $1.5M from the US Government, proving that some things are better left independent.

title: Rust cross-platform GPUI components
author: xvilka
aiHeadline: Rust brings GPU-powered UI components to all platforms, because why have one good thing when you can have it everywhere?
